title: Bloomberg Markets: Koeing on Cybersecurity Threats on Software
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Koeing on Cybersecurity Threats on Software
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Steve Koenig\u0010Software Analyst\u0010Wedbush Securities \u0010Discussing the cybersecurity threat landscape, and what software companies can do about them.
